title: FoodPrint: The Sustainability Quiz
intro: This quiz will help you learn more about food and its impact on the environment and people.
getStarted: To get started, click the "Start" button.
howAccordionDescription: The quiz is made up of a series of multiple-choice questions. For each question, choose the option you think is correct. At the end of the quiz, you will receive a score. Your score will be used to determine your level of food knowledge.
whyAccordionDescription: Taking this quiz will help you learn more about food and its impact on the environment and people. In addition, you will be able to share your score with your friends on social media.
howScoreAccordionDescription: Your score is calculated based on the number of correct answers you have. Each correct answer is worth 1 point. The maximum score is 10 points.
